casebody.data:
Giuseppe Tripodi et al. v. Gem Construction Company, Inc. Gem Construction Company, Inc. v. Giuseppe Tripodi et al. (12162) (12164)

FOTI, LAVERY and SCHALLER, Js.

Argued December 2 decision released December 21, 1993 Thomas J. Sansone, for the appellants (plaintiffs in the first case, defendants in the second case). David A. Haught, with whom, on the brief, was Anthony J. Pantuso, for the appellee (defendant in the first case, plaintiff in the second case). Per Curiam.

The judgments are affirmed.
